name: Shrimp and Tofu Soup
author: Wavedoll
summary: Simple, delicious, hearty, quick, and easy -- this Asian-inspired soup recipe is full of tofu and shrimp, flavored with ginger and garlic plus chicken stock.
ingredients: 1 (1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, minced
6 ounces small shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 tablespoon water, or more as needed
directions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over high heat
Cook until fragrant and lightly browned, about 2 minutes
Pour chicken stock into the saucepan and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium; add tofu, asparagus, salt and cayenne pepper
Stir cornstarch into a bowl with enough water to form a thin paste
Stir into the soup and continue to simmer until clear and thickened, about 1 minute more
Stir shrimp back into soup and serve
